briefTitle: A Study to Compare Administration Schedules of G-CSF (Filgrastim) for Primary Prophylaxis of Febrile Neutropenia
officialTitle: A Multi Centre Study to Compare Administration Schedules of G-CSF (Filgrastim) for Primary Prophylaxis of Chemotherapy-Induced Febrile Neutropenia in Early Stage Breast Cancer (REaCT-G2)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed primary breast cancer
* Planned to start docetaxel component of FEC-D or AC-D, or first cycle of; dose-dense AC-T, TC, FEC-D or TAC chemotherapy
* ≥19 years of age
* Able to provide verbal consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Contraindication to Filgrastim
